comment: A lot of material covered in a Summer class. The only grades were 5 test  with the lowest one being dropped. Tests come straight from powerpoints and anything he says in lecture. Oh, and he does give study guides so be sure to ask.

Easy class. Had him for lecture & lab. The book was more useful for the lab reports. Tests are based heavily on the powerpoints & anything written on the board. He'll do study guides if you ask for them, and do them obviously! Study, pay attention, and you should get a B+ at least. His lectures are very clear. Also, he really loves fish. Trust me.
Great professor. Down 2 earth. PowerPoint are extremely simple, just a good bit of info. He gives a study guide. Pay attention and you will do fine. Dont procrastinate though.

He definitely has a passion for fish! I'm more of a cell person myself but he made multicellular organisms fun for once for me! Still won't be a plant biologist or anything but he's a nice man and I enjoyed his class. He's the best for Bio 2. Also gives out study guides! Just ask him!

Great Bio teacher. Has passion for his expertise. Clear lecture. The course wasn't easy 'cause there was so much material to cover in such a short time. But go to class, pay a decent amount of attention, do the work, thoroughly review the PowerPoints he posts, and GO TO LAB, and you definitely won't get lower than a B, if not an A.

I had him for Limnology, Bio II lab and Ecology. He's a great professor. Exams are fair and consistent with lecture and he's very enthusiastic about the material. Labs are a joy as well. He's personable, fun, and lectures well. All his classes have presentations, so be relatively comfortable with public speaking.
Tests are easy (fair), and everything comes straight from the notes. Take him if you want to learn and get a good grade in the meantime!
Very good teacher. Labs are fun. GOOD SUMMER CLASS Test are difficult but fair.
Great professor! Power points are a great help

I've taken Sakaris for Bio I & II.... Ecology and Ichthyology...He is a GREAT teacher and willing to help anytime.... His tests come right from slides and you dont REALLY need the book but it does help. Tests are VERY fair.

I've taken multiple classes with him and he's GREAT!!! His lectures are very easy to follow and if there is any part you don't understand, he will go over it with you to make sure you do. His labs are fun and interesting. His tests are fair and he never throws a curve-ball question that wasn't mentioned in lecture. I HIGHLY recommend you take him!

Dr. Sakaris is the simply the best. He is very avid and a good orator. His lectures are extremely interesting and his test are fair. He reviews what the class is not getting over and over untill understood. Always friendly; I still keep in touch with him. Read the chapters before class and you'll get an A+ for sure.

Great Teacher. Ive taken Ecology and Ichthiology with him. All test questions come from powerpoints. No need for textbook. Powerpoints are uploaded to webCT. Gives a few easy quizzes throughout semester. Non-comprehensive final.

best biology teacher ever!!! extremely helpful if you need it. labs are the best!!! younger guy so he understands when we get bored and doze off. i will not take anybody else for BIO II. highly recommended... not bad to look at either.

Great teacher! Very helpful in class and outside of class. He prints out his notes (big help) and only covers the important and necessary points to be featured in the test. The quizzes are extremely easy and the test as well. The key to ace the test is read the chapters on the textbook adn you'll do fine. Take this professor.
Makes the class interesting and energetic enough to listen. The powerpoints help a lot.

This guy is the BEST, he somehow senses when the majority of the class does not get a certain point and beats it to death until they do. I WILL take no one else but HIM for BIO2. Tests are not super easy but not extremely difficult either. Easy A if you study. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!

Dr. Sakaris is a great teacher, but gives extremely difficult tests. His homework, lab assignments, and quizes are challenging as well. He gives you great notes to go by and his lectures are extremely interesting. The professor is extremely helpful and goes the extra mile to help his students. He is eloquent and well-spoken. He can be funny too.
No Comments
No Comments
great teacher easy tests
